vis_domains_nbody.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 ! ======================
00002 !
00003 !   VIS_DOMAINS_NBODY
00004 !
00005 !   Send domain data to VISIT-XNBODY for real-time visualisation
00006 !
00007 !
00008 ! ======================
00009 
00010 subroutine vis_domains_nbody
00011 
00012 
00013   use physvars
00014   use treevars
00015   implicit none   
00016 
00017 
00018   integer, parameter :: npart_visit_max = 10000  ! Max data points for VIS
00019   integer, parameter :: ship_max = 10000, attrib_max=22
00020   real*4, dimension(0:attrib_max-1,npart_visit_max) :: vbuffer
00021   integer :: lvisit_active, nskip, nproot, ne_buf, ni_buf, npart_buf, nbufe, nbufi
00022   integer :: i, j, k, ioffset,ixd, iyd, izd, ilev, lcount, wfdatai
00023 
00024   real :: s, simtime, t_display, dummy, xd,yd,zd, dx, dz, dy, epond_max, box_max, epondx, epondy, epondz,phipond, lbox, work_ave
00025   integer :: nship, ierr, cpuid
00026 
00027 
00028   simtime = dt*(itime+itime_start)
00029 
00030   if (beam_config>=3 .and. beam_config<=5) then
00031      t_display = tlaser*convert_fs
00032   else
00033      t_display = simtime
00034   endif
00035   work_ave=SUM(work_loads)/num_pe
00036 
00037   if (me==0) then
00038 
00039      ! ship branch nodes to show domains
00040      do j=1,nbranch_sum
00041         ilev = log( 1.*branch_key(j) )/log(8.)
00042         ixd = SUM( (/ (2**i*ibits( branch_key(j),3*i,1 ), i=0,ilev-1) /) )
00043         iyd = SUM( (/ (2**i*ibits( branch_key(j),3*i+1,1 ), i=0,ilev-1) /) )
00044         izd = SUM( (/ (2**i*ibits( branch_key(j),3*i+2,1 ), i=0,ilev-1) /) )
00045         lbox = boxsize/2**(ilev)          !  box length
00046         ! Store attributes for visualizing
00047         vbuffer(0,j) = t_display
00048         vbuffer(1,j)= xmin + ixd*lbox + lbox/2 ! corners?
00049         vbuffer(2,j)= ymin + lbox*(iyd+.5)
00050         vbuffer(3,j)= zmin + lbox*(izd+.5) 
00051         vbuffer(4,j) = lbox
00052         vbuffer(5,j) = branch_owner(j)  ! cpu id of branch node
00053         cpuid = branch_owner(j)+1
00054         vbuffer(6,j) = work_loads(cpuid)/work_ave   ! total work load of branch node/cpu
00055         vbuffer(7,j) = npps(cpuid) ! total # particles on cpu
00056         vbuffer(8,j) = 0.
00057         vbuffer(9,j) = 0.
00058         vbuffer(10,j) = 0.
00059         vbuffer(11,j) = 0.
00060         vbuffer(12,j) = 0.
00061         vbuffer(13,j) = 0.
00062         vbuffer(14,j) = 0.
00063         vbuffer(15,j) = 0.
00064         vbuffer(16,j) = 16    ! Domain type
00065         vbuffer(17,j) = nbranch_sum  ! Total # branch nodes
00066         vbuffer(18,j) = 0.
00067         vbuffer(19,j) = 0.
00068         vbuffer(20,j) = 0.
00069         vbuffer(21,j) = 0.
00070 
00071 !        write (*,'(7f13.4)') vbuffer(1,j),vbuffer(2,j), vbuffer(4,j), vbuffer(5,j), & 
00072 !             vbuffer(6,j), vbuffer(7,j), vbuffer(17,j)
00073      end do
00074 ! root box
00075      j=nbranch_sum+1  
00076         vbuffer(0,j) = t_display
00077         vbuffer(1,j)= xmin + boxsize/2! corners?
00078         vbuffer(2,j)= ymin + boxsize/2
00079         vbuffer(3,j)= zmin + boxsize/2 
00080         vbuffer(4,j) = boxsize
00081         vbuffer(5,j) = 0  ! cpu id of branch node
00082         cpuid = branch_owner(j)+1
00083         vbuffer(6,j) = 1.   ! total work load of branch node/cpu
00084         vbuffer(7,j) = npart ! total # particles on cpu
00085         vbuffer(8,j) = 0.
00086         vbuffer(9,j) = 0.
00087         vbuffer(10,j) = 0.
00088         vbuffer(11,j) = 0.
00089         vbuffer(12,j) = 0.
00090         vbuffer(13,j) = 0.
00091         vbuffer(14,j) = 0.
00092         vbuffer(15,j) = 0.
00093         vbuffer(16,j) = 16    ! Domain type
00094         vbuffer(17,j) = nbranch_sum+1  ! Total # branch nodes
00095         vbuffer(18,j) = 0.
00096      
00097      call flvisit_nbody2_check_connection(lvisit_active)
00098 
00099      call flvisit_nbody2_partstep_send(vbuffer,nbranch_sum,attrib_max)
00100      
00101 
00102 
00103   endif
00104 
00105 
00106 end subroutine vis_domains_nbody
